name: Fabled Andwraith
effectText:
1 "Fabled" Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
If this card is Special Summoned: Your opponent can discard 1 card to negate this effect, otherwise you can draw 2 cards, then discard 1 card. If a monster(s) is sent from your opponent's hand to the GY (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 of those monsters; Special Summon it to your field, but negate its effects. You can only use each effect of "Fabled Andwraith" once per turn.
